00029 int main( int argc, char** argv ) {
00030 
00031         //create the config file
00032         CConfigFile configFile;
00033 
00034         //test if the config file is passed in
00035         if(argc < 2) {
00036                 //if not print exit message and die
00037                 cout << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " file.ini" << endl;
00038                 exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00039         }else {
00040                 //if so load the config file
00041                 configFile.setFileName(string(argv[1]));
00042         }
00043 
00044         //Set up the SIGUSR1 so we know when a button is pressed
00045         signal(SIGUSR1, signal_handler);
00046         signal(SIGINT, signal_handler);
00047 
00048         //Initialize the WiiController
00049         WiiController::create();
00050 
00051         //Set the motor controller to connect to the port name in the config file
00052         MotorController::setPortName( configFile.read_string("MOTOR", "COM_port_LIN", "/dev/ttyS1" ) );
00053 
00054         yclops = new YClopsNavigationSystem2( configFile );
00055         yclops->useNullMotorCommand();
00056 
00057         while(1) {
00058 
00059                 yclops->doProcess();
00060 
00061         }
00062 
00063         return 0;
00064 }
00065 
00066 void signal_handler( int signum ) {
00067 
00068         if( SIGINT == signum ) {
00069                 if( NULL == yclops ) {
00070                         delete yclops;
00071                 }
00072         } else if( SIGUSR1 == signum ) {
